5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Malik b. Huwairith Abu Sulaiman reported:I came to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) along with other persons and we were young men of nearly equal age, and the rest of the hadith was transmitted like the hadith narrated before

chapter.eng-name: Who is more entitled to lead the prayer
